Title: India’s GSPC seeks one second-half May LNG delivery to Dahej
Description: India’s state-owned Gujarat State Petroleum Corp. (GSPC) has issued a tender to buy one cargo for delivery on May 25-27 to the 17.5 mtpa Dahej LNG receiving terminal in India’s western state of Gujarat. The tender closes on Apr. 13.
Author: CK

Title: Pertamina offers one LNG cargo loading in 2H May at Bontang
Description: Indonesia’s state-owned Pertamina is offering one LNG cargo that will load on May 26-28 at the 11.5 mtpa Bontang LNG export plant in Indonesia through a tender that closes tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: Prelude restarts LNG operations, ships first cargo after December shutdown
Description: The Shell-operated 3.6 mtpa Prelude floating LNG (FLNG) facility in Western Australia’s Browse Basin has restarted operations, shipping its first LNG cargo yesterday after a forced shutdown in December.
Author: CK
